properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 6:17PM EST until February 7 at 3:18AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Falling Creek near East Juliette  affecting Jones County

Little River near Eatonton affecting Putnam County


...Observed Flooding Changed from Minor to Moderate Severity for the
following rivers in Georgia...

Etowah River near Dawsonville affecting Dawson County


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Little River near Eatonton.
* From this evening until late tonight.
* At 530 PM Thursday the stage was 19.4 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast to develop.
* Flood stage is 20 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by early this
evening and continue rising, reaching to near 20.4 feet later this
evening. The river is expected to fall below flood stage by late
tonight.
* At 20 feet, minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields along
the river of the Oconee National Forest upstream and downstream from
the gage on Georgia Highway 16, or Monticello Road.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
